translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Sereyya
The Elder Sammukhāvasati’s Birth Story
“When Vipassī was being born,
I declared the sign:
‘He will extinguish the people,
and will become a Buddha in the world.’
And when he was being born,
the ten-thousand worlds trembled;
Now that Blessed One, the Teacher,
teaches the Dhamma with vision.
And when he was being born,
a great light appeared;
Now that Blessed One, the Teacher,
teaches the Dhamma with vision.
And when he was being born,
the rivers did not overflow;
Now that Blessed One, the Teacher,
teaches the Dhamma with vision.
And when he was being born,
the Avīci fire did not blaze;
Now that Blessed One, the Teacher,
teaches the Dhamma with vision.
And when he was being born,
the flock of birds did not move;
Now that Blessed One, the Teacher,
teaches the Dhamma with vision.
And when he was being born,
the wind-element did not blow;
Now that Blessed One, the Teacher,
the one with vision teaches the Dhamma.
And when he was born
all the treasures shone;
Now that Blessed One, the Teacher,
the one with vision teaches the Dhamma.
And when he was born
the beings in the world were changed;
Now that Blessed One, the Teacher,
the one with vision teaches the Dhamma.
As soon as the Buddha was born
he looked in all directions;
he spoke with the voice of a leader,

analyzed: esā buddhāna dhamma tā  savejayitvā janata
translated: this is the nature of Buddhas.’🔽Having inspired the people
and having praised the leader of the world,
having paid homage to the Buddha,
I departed facing east.
For ninety-one eons
I worshipped the Buddha;
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of my worship.
For ninety eons from now
I will be called Sammukhāthavika,
endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful wheel-turning monarch.
Named Pathavīdundubhi,
nineteen eons ago,
endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful wheel-turning monarch.
Eighty-eight eons ago,
the noble one named Obhāsa,
He was endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful universal monarch.
Eighty-seven eons ago,
known as Saritacchedana,
he was endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful universal monarch.🔽Eighty-six eons ago,
known as Agginibbāpana,
he was endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful universal monarch.🔽Fifty-seven eons ago,
known as Gatipacchedana,
he was endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful universal monarch.🔽Fifty-three eons ago,

analyzed: rājā vātasamaḥ nāma  kappānam culla sītiyā
translated: known as Rājā Vatasamo,
he was endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful universal monarch.🔽Fifty-three eons ago,
known as Ratanapajjala,
he was endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful universal monarch.🔽Fifty-two eons ago,
known as Padavikkamana,
he was endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful universal monarch.🔽Fifty-one eons ago,
known as Rājā Vilokana,
he was endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful universal monarch.🔽Fifty eons ago,
a warrior king named Girasāroti,
he was endowed with the seven treasures,
was a powerful Universal Monarch.
The four analytical knowledges,

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā sammukhāthaviko thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā sammukhāthavikaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: I have done the Buddha’s bidding.”🔽Thus the elder Sammukhāvasati recited these verses.
The Story of the Elder Sammukhāvasati is the fifth.
